body_text.text: This invisible enemy, this corona virus, has caused illness and death, created fear in all of us for our families and ourselves, challenged us in maintaining our efforts to care for our patients, and attempted to derail our educational and research efforts and activities through the stress and disruption of the life patterns we may occasionally if not often have taken for granted.
You all have undoubtedly heard this and similar messages of gratitude from the many you work with and for.
I too want to express my gratitude to our investigators, authors, reviewers, editors, production staff and publishers for their tireless and courageous efforts in behalf of Urologic Oncology.
I extend my heartfelt wishes to all of you for you to stay safe and well through this crisis.

BIBREF0.title: Urologic Oncology: Seminars and Original Investigations

FIGREF0.text: Letter from the Editor, "Thank you", Michael J. Droller, M.D. Michael J. Droller, M.D. Editor Dear Colleagues, We are all now facing challenges most if not all of us had neither expected nor previously encountered.
